phrs.translation: n. [地]沉降速度；[医]血沉速度
红细胞沉降率，红血球沉降速度
[工]沉降分析法；[地]沉积分析；[物化]沉淀分析

sentences.sentence: Problems are analyzed such as the subgrade bearing capacity, sedimentations and anti-float.
sentences.translation: 针对相关地基承载力及沉降、抗浮等问题作了分析与探讨。

sentences.sentence: The dust sedimentations have never been intermitted even in the soil-forming periods when the climates were warmer and wetter.
sentences.translation: 这种风尘沉积作用即使在气候较为湿热的古土壤发育时期也未中断。

sentences.sentence: To look for new exploration targets become an austere task based on an detailed re-investigation of structures and sedimentations.
sentences.translation: 对构造、沉积特征进行精细研究，寻找新的勘探目标成为一项严峻的任务。
